answers.answer: My sister had it too. Take your pills follow the diabetic diet and check when your suppose to. As long as you follow your doctor's advice and notify them if something seems off you and your baby will pull through.  Stay positive.

question: Diagnosed with gestational diabetes, I'm worried my baby isn't growing. How do I know she is getting what she needs? I've lost 15 lbs my entire pregnancy.
title: ready but nervous
